about_the_game:
Grumpy Football: A Hilarious, High-Energy Soccer Extravaganza

Welcome to the world of Grumpy Football, where “standard matches” are nowhere to be found—only passion and chaos reign! This is a soccer experience unlike any other, packed with crazy skills, wacky physics collisions, and all kinds of bizarre shots. Precision alone won’t be enough—you’ll need creativity, cunning, and guts to outplay your opponents and turn the pitch into your personal stage!

Key Features

  • Outrageous Skills, Unleash at Will
    From flying kicks and sliding tackles to fancy dribbles, every character is equipped with their own unique abilities. Imagine blasting the ball into the net with a rocket-powered shot—or making it disappear with a magic trick, leaving your opponents baffled! There are no rules—just thrills and excitement!

  • Playful Physics, Unpredictable Results
    The ball doesn’t just spin or bounce—it can end up in the most unexpected places! Player collisions trigger hilarious ragdoll effects, adding laughter to every encounter. With humor and competition intertwined, you'll be laughing all the way through every match.

  • Endless Ways to Score
    Curl a perfect banana shot, pull off a bicycle kick, or sneak past the goalie with ninja-like stealth. If you can imagine it, it can be your signature move. The only limit is your creativity!

  • Multiple Modes: Solo Challenges and Multiplayer Mayhem
    Whether you’re challenging AI opponents or teaming up with friends locally or online, Grumpy Football delivers surprises at every turn. Gather your crew and dive into a rule-free, chaotic brawl where anything goes!

  • Spontaneous Fun Anytime, Anywhere
    You never know what’s coming next—a ridiculous own goal, or your teammate accidentally tripping you up. Unexpected moments and bursts of laughter fill every match, making it impossible to stop playing!

“Scoring goals isn’t the only way to win—causing chaos is our true goal!”
Download Grumpy Football now and unleash your creativity to outsmart your rivals with crazy tricks! Victory isn’t just for the pros—it’s for those who laugh the hardest. Get ready for a soccer party like no other!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 3.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0x compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8500 3.00 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, similar or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0x compatible sound card
